    Classes in digital.ivan.lightchain.starter.tools that implement IRouterToolCall
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    HumanRouterTool
    The HumanRouterTool class provides an implementation of the IRouterToolCall interface to facilitate human intervention in situations where the machine does not have sufficient information.
    class 
    VectorSearchTool
    This VectorSearchTool class provides an implementation of the IRouterToolCall interface, enabling vector-based searching capabilities.
